attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to private citizens.
attributes.additional_details: Because people set them off all year long and causes distress to animal's
attributes.background: Make  the selling of fireworks illegal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition which call very similar actions:

'Ban the sale of fireworks to protect animals': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605076 

'Make fireworks illegal to buy, with the exception of public displays.': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591501

'Ban the manufacture, import, sale and use of fireworks in the UK': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599738
